pr_title: Begin moving date_histogram to offset rounding

timeline.message:
Begin moving date_histogram to offset rounding

We added a new rounding in #50609 that handles offsets to the start and
end of the rounding so that we could support `offset` in the `composite`
aggregation. This starts moving `date_histogram` to that new offset.

timeline.bodyText: Excellent formatting choice, much more readable.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

timeline.bodyText: Glad to see this getting moved into the rounding itself.  Makes much more sense.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

timeline.bodyText: What's the plan to migrate away from this? I'm not sure I understand the benefit to adding a deprecated method now that we intend to remove in the next PR, as opposed to just removing the need for it in this PR.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

replies.bodyText: I added this to cut the PR in half, basically. I'll remove it in a followup. I believe that follow up with have serialization changes so it'll feel pretty different than this PR.
